product_name: Mountain House Precooked Eggs with Bacon ProPak - Single Serving
long_description: Wake up in the wilderness and smell the bacon! Enjoy scrambled eggs and bacon pieces without making a mess--just add hot water and in a few minutes you'll have a delicious backcountry breakfast.
short_description: Wake up in the wilderness and smell the bacon! Enjoy scrambled eggs and bacon pieces without making a mess--just add hot water and in a few minutes you'll have a delicious backcountry breakfast.
